steps: Mix quinoline-8-carboxaldehyde and diaminomaleonitrile in methanol and heat to 60 - 75째C with continuous stirring.
Reflux for 1 h, filter, and wash with methanol three times to obtain QCDM.
Disperse QCDM in methanol, add zinc acetate solution dropwise under stirring, filter, and allow solvent to evaporate slowly in refrigerator for 2 weeks to form Zn-QCDM crystals.
Mix 2-hydroxy-1-naphthaldehyde and diaminomaleonitrile in methanol and heat to 60 - 75째C under stirring.
Add zinc acetate solution dropwise to the hot solution, followed by gradual addition of HCl solution.
Filter and wash with methanol three times after cooling to room temperature to obtain Zn-HNDM.
